crusty.translation[0].definitions[0].def: bread that is crusty is pleasant to eat because it has a hard crust
crusty.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who is crusty is bad-tempered
crusty.translation[0].definitions[2].def: having a thin dry hard layer of something on the surface
crusty.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: The lake was ringed by crusty salt deposits.
crusty.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a young person with a dirty and untidy appearance, usually one who has no permanent job or home and takes part in protests about protecting the environment
